title: [1.62][SMP][SSP]更多生命值mod塞尔达modnohero's Mods
author: 1123fff
txt_content:
本帖最后由 1123fff 于 2013-10-5 13:26 编辑 



这是什么mod？


更多生命值mod对生命值系统进行了一次大的修改。
你可以用“使用以四个生命碎片合成生命之心”或者“提升等级”这俩个途径提升你的生命值。
你可以更改你自己的血量为初始生命值(塞尔达传送将之设置为3)和最大生命值(30颗心！)
此外，你可以随着等级的上升，而获得额外的生命值。
最后，你可以选择将生命之心模式和RPG模式打开或者关闭(生命之心模式(heart items)不知道译成什么·然后就译成了这个，意思是关掉了这个设置，生命之心对你没有提升生命值的帮助)

E文介绍

More Health is a complete overhaul of the health system. You can gain more health (hearts) with heart containers crafted from 4 heart pieces (found in most chests and dropped by bosses!!) and/or gain health through levels (exp). You can completely customize your starting hearts (set it at 3 for Zelda nostalgia!) and max hearts (caps at 30 hearts!). In addition, you can customize the level ramp, which included the levels you earn hearts at. Finally, you can choose to turn the heart items mode and RPG mode on or off. 



+hardcore模式！在死亡后·你将会失去你所有的心，并且恢复到初始状态！
+有些mod可能也有生命之心(我记得叫做“帝国传说”)
+铁匠箱子，矿井箱子，要塞箱子都有生命之心、心之碎片！（分别是村民村庄里的箱子，地下废矿道的箱子，还有去末地传送门的要塞的箱子）
+丛林/沙漠神庙箱子也有生命之心、心之碎片！看·图片：




vBlqA.png (67.83 KB, 下载次数: 163)

下载附件

2013-10-5 10:16 上传






E文介绍

+HARDCORE MODE! On death, lose all your heart progress and reset to starting health!
 +some mods may have heart container patches (i remember tales of kingdom) 
 +Blacksmith chest, mineshaft shaft chest, and Stronghold chests have Heart items! 
+Jungle/Desert Temple Chests have Heart Item loot! Picture:







.::下载::.更多生命值modv4.5 MC1.6.2支持原作者请adfly下载点http://adf.ly/TYDuI

http://pan.baidu.com/s/19opjA
要同时下载到客户端和服务端！要求：Forge APIForge 9.10.0.804或者其它版本也有可能可以使用。最好是使用Forge安装在1.6+上更多生命值mod的补丁截止目前还没有(这个老外好欠抽的感觉←_←)

E文介绍



.::DOWNLOADS::.More Health Enhanced V4.5 MC 1.6.2Universal DownloadDownload for BOTH client and server!Required: Forge APIMade for Forge 9.10.0.804-other versions may work.Installer is the best way to use Forge on MC 1.6+More Health Enhanced Patches  None as of now.








SSP 安装


安装forge api
(安装forge api的步骤·老纸看了看·感觉怪怪的·所以就不贴了)
关于mod的安装
1·下载mod压缩包到mods文件夹（%appdata%\.minecraft\mods）
2·启动mc  享受游戏带给你的乐趣~！

3·若是有任何问题或者建议·请回帖

E文·
SSP Installation

1. Drop the zipped file into the mods folder. (%appdata%\.minecraft\mods)

2. Run minecraft, enjoy! 

3. Any questions/suggestions, post in the thread!






SMP 安装：
首先当然要安装forge！
1·转到 http://minecraft.net/download.下载 minecraft_server.jar文件。创建一个新的文件夹并把它放进去。这将是你的服务端文件夹(这不废话呒←_←)


2·找到你设立的那个服务端·然后把mod压缩文件放到“mods”文件夹 

3·Config 文件夹(配置文件夹): 你可以打开这个文件夹并找到配置文件， 并且安装你的意愿而修改。配置文件可以改变服务端的配置 。每个玩家在服务端里都被同样的规则所限制。当玩家在服务端里的时候·每个玩家的配置都会被覆盖

4·把config文件夹放到新创建的文件夹里。这样·在服务端启动的时候，这些设置这些改变都会被应用(最重要的multiplier配置·Ta只会影响新生成的区域，你原先存在的那些区域将不会用生命之心、心之碎片·这样的服不是好的服！)

5·开服·然后享受游戏带给你的乐趣！

6·如果有任何问题·建议·反馈·请回帖或者搜索“nohero more health”(这个mod的E文名字)

E文

SMP Installation:


Be sure to install forge!

1. Get the minecraft_server jar from http://minecraft.net/download. Create a new folder and put this jar into it. This will be your server folder.

2. Drag the zipped file into the "mods" folder found where you set up your server.

3. Config folder: you can open this folder to find the config file, which you can change as you wish. It will determine all the settings for the entire server. Everyone will be playing on the same rules (aka no cheating) enforced by the server config. The individual player's config gets overridden when on the server.

4. Drag the config folder into your newly created folder. Thus, when the server starts, it right away has the changed options (most importantly the multiplier config - it only affects newly generated areas, so if you start the server without dragging the config file, the starting generated area will probably have limited heart containers/items which is not good for server!)

5. Start the server, enjoy 

6. And questions/suggestions/feedback, please post on the forum, search for nohero more health!





配置文件

如何修改配置文件：
1·启动MC(需要先安装好这个mod)

2·然后关闭MC
       是打开MC并且进入游戏，建议砍棵树挖个矿什么的，若是推倒了小动物升级了得到了血量提升那便更好了(为了确保mod的配置文件已经生成)

3·到.minecraft/config/nohero_moreHealth.cfg路径找到文件然后用java开发工具notepad打开(用记事本也可以的）

4·如果在服务端·配置文件会在你启动后生成在服务端文件夹中(如果你没有把配置文件放进去)

5·不要编辑修改开头的#符号·这些都是命令代码
你可以且你想要的只有俩个需要修改
LevelRamp=1,3,5,6,7,8... (分别设置你提升血量时候的等级)←意思是 你在·级3级5级的时候都会增加1生命值
StartingHearts=20 (改变初始血量·值在1~20之间), 通常都是10


6·打开MC开始享受游戏带给你的乐趣吧~！
这些配置文件是可以影响到你所有的世界的·

E文

Config File:


How to:

1. Start up minecraft with this mod.

2.Shut down Minecraft.

3.Open %appdata%/.minecraft/config/nohero_moreHealth.cfg with a program like notepad. (Note you have to run minecraft once after installing mod for this file to pop up).

4(server) if on server, the config (if you didn't drag it) will auto generate in the server jar's folder.

5.Do not edit the lines starting with #! they are just comments!
You have two things you can configure yourself, anyway you want!

LevelRamp=1,3,5,6,7,8... (Set the levels you want to gain hearts on! <default> below)
StartingHearts=20 (change the starting hearts, from 1 to 20), default 10.

5. Start Minecraft, enjoy! These config settings will affect ALL your worlds.






鸣谢

与Advanced HUD 和Rei's minimap可以兼容
如果你要把这俩个mod和本mod一起使用，只要把它们都放到mods文件夹就可以了！把Advanced HUD的状态信息栏设置成 >60. 1 width= 1 health = 1/2 heart就可以了




Compatible with Advanced HUD and Rei's minimap
If you want to install those two mods with mine, add them to the mods folder! Set the width of health bar in Advanced HUD >60. 1 width= 1 health = 1/2 heart.
